attributes.action: petition to stop paying benefits for migrants who have paid nothing in
attributes.background: we want benefits stopped for everyone who come to this country with out enough money to support themselves while searching for work , no more house queue jumping before british citizens no more NHS without paying in to it and no benefits of any sort

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like changes to the rules on benefits, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
